overview: Andi Hatta's company, a cloth merchant who inherited the family business, suddenly became the target of many people. It was widely heard that the company had illegal relics that were deliberately hidden. Andi Hatta finally hired a private detective belonging to Ratu and Rio to protect his company and at the same time reveal the truth of the news, but in the middle of the investigation the atmosphere became chaotic with the intervention of 3 funny employees, Uyha, Noya and Luna who worked at the company.
title: Sang Saudagar #TabePuang
